message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $9,500. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, I am only able to pay up to $8,800 for the product. I hope this offer is acceptable.
Thanks for your offer, Bob.  I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to $9,200 for this product given its value.  Would that be agreeable to you?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter your offer at $9,000. This is my final offer.
